category.name: Product Structure.Design Context Context Definition
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PortalDesignContextExcludedWorkPart.Types
preference.preference_description: Specifies the item types excluded from the Work Part list in Design Context. For sites that have not yet migrated to Teamcenter Change Viewer, Siemens PLM Software recommends excluding EngChange items. Valid Values: Any Teamcenter item type.
